	private EpiDataView edvQuoteHed;
	private DynamicQueryImpl dynamicQuery;

	public void InitializeCustomCode()
	{
		// ** Wizard Insert Location - Do not delete 'Begin/End Wizard Added Variable Initialization' lines **
		// Begin Wizard Added Variable Initialization

		// End Wizard Added Variable Initialization

		// Begin Wizard Added Custom Method Calls

		// End Wizard Added Custom Method Calls

		btnSFEndUser.Click += new System.EventHandler(btnSFEndUser_Click);
		btnSFRegion.Click += new System.EventHandler(btnSFRegion_Click);
		btnSFCountry.Click += new System.EventHandler(btnSFCountry_Click);
		//eb2:
		btnMarket.Click += new System.EventHandler(btnMarket_Click);
		this.edvQuoteHed = ((EpiDataView)(this.oTrans.EpiDataViews["QuoteHed"]));
		Session session = (Session)this.oTrans.Session;
		dynamicQuery = WCFServiceSupport.CreateImpl<DynamicQueryImpl>(session, ImplBase<DynamicQuerySvcContract>.UriPath);

	}

	public void DestroyCustomCode()
	{
		// ** Wizard Insert Location - Do not delete 'Begin/End Wizard Added Object Disposal' lines **
		// Begin Wizard Added Object Disposal

		// End Wizard Added Object Disposal

		// Begin Custom Code Disposal

		// End Custom Code Disposal

		btnSFEndUser.Click -= new System.EventHandler(btnSFEndUser_Click);
		btnSFRegion.Click -= new System.EventHandler(btnSFRegion_Click);
		btnSFCountry.Click -= new System.EventHandler(btnSFCountry_Click);
		//eb2:
		btnMarket.Click -= new System.EventHandler(btnMarket_Click);
		this.edvQuoteHed = null;
		dynamicQuery = null;
		dynamicQuery.Dispose();

	}

	//eb2:
	private void QuoteForm_Load(object sender, EventArgs args)
	{
		DynamicQueryDataSet ds = new DynamicQueryDataSet();
		try
		{
			ds = dynamicQuery.GetByID("GetMarketIndustryClassCodes");
		}
		catch (BusinessObjectException ex)
		{
			if (   (ex.ToString().Contains("does not exist"))
			    || (ex.ToString().Contains("id is not found")) )
			{
				MessageBox.Show("The BAQ 'GetMarketIndustryClassCodes' does not exist.");
			}
			else
			{
				MessageBox.Show(ex.ToString());
			}
		}

		QueryExecutionDataSet execDS = new QueryExecutionDataSet();
		execDS.AcceptChanges();
		
		DataTable dtResults = dynamicQuery.Execute(ds, execDS).Tables["Results"];
		eucMarket.DataSource = dtResults;
		eucMarket.DataMember = "";
		eucMarket.ValueMember = "ICCode_Description";
		eucMarket.DisplayMember = "ICCode_Description";
		eucMarket.DataBind();                


	}


	private void btnSFEndUser_Click(object sender, System.EventArgs args)
	{			
		SearchOnCustomerAdapterShowDialog();
	}
	private void btnSFRegion_Click(object sender, System.EventArgs args)
	{			
		SearchOnRegionAdapterShowDialog();
	}
	private void btnSFCountry_Click(object sender, System.EventArgs args)
	{			
		SearchOnCountryAdapterShowDialog();
	}
	//eb2:
	private void btnMarket_Click(object sender, System.EventArgs args)
	{			
		getIndClassCodeFromSearch(true, "MARKET");

	}

	private void SearchOnCustomerAdapterShowDialog()
	{
		// Wizard Generated Search Method
		// You will need to call this method from another method in custom code
		// For example, [Form]_Load or [Button]_Click

		bool recSelected;
		string whereClause = string.Empty;
		System.Data.DataSet dsCustomerAdapter = Ice.UI.FormFunctions.SearchFunctions.listLookup(this.oTrans, "CustomerAdapter", out recSelected, true, whereClause);
		if (recSelected)
		{
			System.Data.DataRow adapterRow = dsCustomerAdapter.Tables[0].Rows[0];

			// Map Search Fields to Application Fields
			EpiDataView edvQuoteHed = ((EpiDataView)(this.oTrans.EpiDataViews["QuoteHed"]));
			System.Data.DataRow edvQuoteHedRow = edvQuoteHed.CurrentDataRow;
			if ((edvQuoteHedRow != null))
			{
				edvQuoteHedRow.BeginEdit();
				edvQuoteHedRow["SFEndUser_c"] = adapterRow["CustNum"];
				edvQuoteHedRow.EndEdit();
			}
		}
	}

		// Wizard Generated Search Method

	//eb2:
	private void getIndClassCodeFromSearch(bool fromSearch, string icCode)
	{
		//from ilspy findings in customer entry ui and tweaked
		//since using the typical simple search doesn't work on the industry code child table
	
		DataView dataView = oTrans.QuoteHedView.dataView;
		foreach (DataRowView dataRowView in dataView)
		{
			SearchOptions searchOptions = new SearchOptions(SearchMode.ShowDialog);
			searchOptions.DataSetMode = DataSetMode.RowsDataSet;
			searchOptions.SelectMode = SelectMode.SingleSelect;
			string text = "MARKET";
	
			if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(text))
			{
				searchOptions.PreLoadSearchFilter = "ICTypeID = '" + text + "'";
			}
			try
			{
				IndClassCodeSearchAdapter icCodeSearchAdapter = new IndClassCodeSearchAdapter(oTrans);
				icCodeSearchAdapter.ClearData();
	
				if (fromSearch)
				{
					icCodeSearchAdapter.InvokeSearch(searchOptions);
				}
				else
				{
					icCodeSearchAdapter.GetByID(text, icCode);
				}
				if (icCodeSearchAdapter.IndClassCodeSearchData.ICCode.Count > 0)
				{
					IndClassCodeSearchDataSet.ICCodeRow iCCodeRow = icCodeSearchAdapter.IndClassCodeSearchData.ICCode[0];
					dataRowView.BeginEdit();
					dataRowView["SFMarket_c"] = iCCodeRow.Description;
					dataRowView.EndEdit();
	
					//need this:???
					//base.LastView.Notify(new EpiNotifyArgs(this, base.LastView.Row, base.LastView.Column));
	
				}
			}
			catch (Exception ex)
			{
				dataRowView["SFMarket_c"] = "";
				ExceptionBox.Show(ex);
			}
	
		}
	
	
	}






}
